name: Citizens Advice
membership: Affiliate Member of BEUC (the European Consumers Association)
goal:
Citizens Advice is Great Britain's largest provider of free, confidential & impartial advice to help people resolve their problems (spanning debt and employment to housing and immigration). The service also works to improve the policies and practices that affect people's lives.

We have been given formal responsibility and powers by the UK Government to represent consumers in economically regulated markets, in particular in energy and postal services. We deliver these responsibilities by carrying out investigations, research and analysis in order to represent consumer interests towards businesses, regulators, governments and policy makers.
interests: Consumers, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives: Citizens Advice engages in a broad range of policy areas that impact citizens' interests.  EU initiatives of relevance to our strategic priorities this year include: the European Energy Union, post & parcels services and consumer protection.
